snippet.title: [SM64 Major Hack] Another Mario Adventure Release Video
snippet.description:
Another Mario Adventure is a major hack that contains 120 stars. This game is being in development for over 2 years and ended up containing 10 guest stage of various styles, difficulty and length.
I am so glad I managed to finish this game which I consider my biggest achievement in SM64 hacking. Expected blind playthrough time for experienced player is 5-7 hours.
The guest creators: BroDute, Tomatobird8, UsernamesAreSpiders, scuttlebug_raiser, sm64pie, Cheezepin, Crash, MrComit, ToasterKetchup, Kaze

Z64: https://mega.nz/file/eSA03bwI#UHmTUpVOGhc4epqmDolqNuglMyJcfS3Vl8VgGIAkgao
BPS: https://mega.nz/file/XWASQRbI#iFsoXhhPWcPHGYtYCa7ZlHEKda8lxdU6IXqXX2j6_MU
Game Map: https://mega.nz/file/HHAkyAKD#4l_NZ9YtZSXbmZEAHIe7ZaQwZIEygUNHYKLlJFnYgM8
WiiVC WAD: https://mega.nz/file/6f5TCIxb#Hw8xktqvG9P2-91bZXOdFBfQIV27BIIqDO8d4aluvdc
WiiVC WAD Configurator: https://mega.nz/file/jWxyWRJL#pqt1p4Y9ofw5mvDoGcriZnGiGulzXRjNTHZPTC0FaTY

All Publicly Released Versions: https://mega.nz/folder/iXQyDRJR#JkvP7YR32g9hWnvr6bTeXQ

Recommended Emulator:
PJ64 1.6 Prebuilt: https://mega.nz/file/ya5ngYKZ#VnR9BPWWjSh0a9K4HkomN8mzuh5wRHehiIB7TzZ9Nl8 
Do not forget to set memory size to 8Mb and Counter Factor to 1! Jabo Video and Audio plugins are heavily discouraged as they cause visual glitches and audio artifacts.
Edit files "f3d.yaml" and "map.yaml" in "Config" directory to setup resolution and controls for LINK's Fast3DEngine and Mapper accordingly. Using LINK's GLideN64 and Jabo Input is also supported which are provided in presetup emu.

For more gameplay, please check the F3 Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9Mlqalgva8
